Event.MetaKeywords: navaratri celebrations, london navaratri celebrations, navaratri dandiya
Event.MetaDescription: South Indian Society celebrates Navaratri Dandiya 2013 in London. Come and join us!
Event.Address: Church of Ascension Hall, Beaufort Road, Ealing W5 3EB
Event.Maindescription:
SIS Musical Galatta Evening

Events

5.30 p.m : Registration
6.00 p.m : Karaoke
7:15 p.m : Kolattam
8:30 p.m : Dinner

Members who wish to participate in the Karaoke, please contact sisnambalava@gmail.com before the 5th of Sep 2013.

MEMBERS WHO WISH TO PARTICIPATE IN THE KOLATAM ARE REQUESTED TO BRING THEIR OWN KOLATAM/DANDIYA STICKS AS SIS WILL NOT BE ABLE TO PROVIDE THE STICKS.

Please RSVP by 16th September

As an incentive to encourage early confirmations and payments whilst simultaneously attempting to keep costs and food wastage down to the minimum, the entrance fee has been restructured as follows:

Reduced fee for Members Confirming & Paying in advance (by 16th September) : £7 (Preferred option)
Members: £10
Non members : £12
Children (between 5 and 10) : £4

Mailing address
No 7 Erroll Road
Romford
Essex
RM1 3DJ

Bank account details
Bank Sort Code: 20-29-37
A/c Name: South Indian Society
A/c No. 50284645
Ref: Musical Evening
or
Ref: Mem and Musical Evening

See you all at the next event on 21th September.

SIS Trustees

PS: Due to operational difficulties, we operate on a no adjustment / refund policy. Thanks for understanding and cooperation
